answers.answer: If there is any chance he has diabetes, be sure he gets this checked out quickly.  If he is overweight, it could be a stress fracture.  It could be a foreign body.  The possibilities are many, and if he hasn't seen his primary medical doc, this is a good time for a checkup.  If his checkup is done and was fine, a podiatrist might be a good choice.If it might be a foreign body, soak the foot in Epson salts twice a day for 3 days and note if there is improvement.

question: My husband has swelling on the left side of his foot, very painful to walk, limping quite a bit, just happened one morning when he got out of bed, what would be the reason for this?
title: pain
